EastEnd Meats and Sausage

Eastend Meats & Sausage

"Taste the quality, taste the difference."

Located in Winnipeg, Manitoba, we've been committed to serving quality meats products in the Transcona neighborhoods for years. Whether you’re shopping for locally-sourced fresh meats, homestyle sausage, deli meats, or jerky, you can always count on us for great quality and taste.
